channel.title: (delta) Help with magic spell damage
channel.description:
I tried changing the hitdiff in magicspell.config
but i can't seem to lower the hit of magic.
People are hitting like 200's and higher on my server, would like to know how to change it so mage don't hit so high giving all other combat skills a equal balance?

item.title: (delta) Help with magic spell damage
